subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: Borrowed from {{bor|zh|ja|-}} {{m|ja|さん|tr=-san}}. Compare {{etyl|nan|-}} {{zh-l|卡桑|tr=[[khà-sàng]]}}, {{zh-l|多桑|tr=[[tò-sàng]]}}, {{zh-l|歐巴桑|tr=[[o͘-bá-sáng]]}}, and {{zh-l|歐吉桑|tr=[[o͘-jí-sáng]]}}.

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
Usage notes
subSections.text:
{{U:ja:biology|クワ}}

This term can refer to the fruit or the tree.  For greater specificity, the following may be used:
* {{ja-r|桑の木|くわ の き}}: [[mulberry]] [[tree]]
* {{ja-r|桑の実|くわ の み}}: [[mulberry]] [[fruit]]
